commands.name: az databoxedge device storage-account container create
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device storage-account container create --container-name
                                                       --data-format {AzureFile, BlockBlob, PageBlob}
                                                       --device-name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       --storage-account-name
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az databoxedge device storage-account container create -g rg --device-name name --storage-account-name name -n container-name --data-format BlockBlob

commands.name: az databoxedge device storage-account container delete
commands.summary: Delete the container on the Data Box Edge/Data Box Gateway device.
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device storage-account container delete [--container-name]
                                                       [--device-name]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--storage-account-name]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--yes]
examples: az databoxedge device storage-account container delete -g rg --device-name name --storage-account-name name -n container-name

commands.name: az databoxedge device storage-account container list
commands.summary: List all the containers of a storage account in a Data Box Edge/Data Box Gateway device.
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device storage-account container list --device-name
                                                     --resource-group
                                                     --storage-account-name
                                                     [--max-items]
                                                     [--next-token]
examples: az databoxedge device storage-account container list -g rg --device-name name --storage-account-name name

commands.name: az databoxedge device storage-account container show
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device storage-account container show [--container-name]
                                                     [--device-name]
                                                     [--ids]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--storage-account-name]
                                                     [--subscription]
examples: az databoxedge device storage-account container show -g rg --device-name name --storage-account-name name -n container-name

commands.name: az databoxedge device storage-account container update
commands.syntax:
az databoxedge device storage-account container update [--add]
                                                       [--container-name]
                                                       [--data-format {AzureFile, BlockBlob, PageBlob}]
                                                       [--device-name]
                                                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--remove]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--set]
                                                       [--storage-account-name]
                                                       [--subscription]
examples: az databoxedge device storage-account container update -g rg --device-name name --storage-account-name name -n container-name --data-format BlockBlob
